DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine best way feed child gastrostomy tube place . The study compare bolus feed continuous feeding .
DOC.brief_title: Bolus Versus Continuous Feeding Regimens Post Gastrostomy Tube Placement
DOC.detailed_description: This study consist prospective , randomized comparison bolus versus continuous enteral feeding protocol pediatric patient gastrostomy tube
DOC.criteria: Less 18 year age Admitted gastrostomy tube placement , without Nissen Fundoplication Immunocompromised patient Short Bowel Syndrome ( SBS )
